page.description: CertificateNameIsValid returns .t. if a certificate the name provided matches one that has been loaded into the current subscription.

argument.name: CertificateName
argument.description: The name of the certificate (the DNS name typically).

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .t. if the function call succeeded and .f. if it failed. Look at the CallResult property to determine the cause of a failure.
